docs.lead_paragraph: The Affordable Care Act may well be on track to meeting its primary goal, but reining in health care spending still appears well beyond the grasp of the law.

headline.main: Acceleration Is Forecast for Spending on Health
headline.print_headline: Acceleration Is Forecast for Spending on Health

docs.abstract: Eduardo Porter Economic Scene column; Affordable Care Act may well be on track to meeting its primary goal of providing coverage for most uninsured Americans, but reining in health care spending still appears well beyond the grasp of the law.
docs.snippet: The Affordable Care Act may well be on track to meeting its primary goal, but reining in health care spending still appears well beyond the grasp of the law.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Economix Meets the Gales of Change

docs.abstract: Economix is coming to an end, but it will be succeeded by The Upshot, a new politics, policy and economics site.
docs.snippet: Economix is coming to an end, but it will be succeeded by The Upshot, a new politics, policy and economics site.
